013package org.apache.juneau.examples.core.config.store;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.common.utils.Utils.*;
016
017import java.util.*;
018import java.util.concurrent.*;
019
020import org.apache.juneau.common.utils.*;
021import org.apache.juneau.config.store.*;
022
023/**
024 * Example of a {@link ConfigStore} that uses a relational database as a backend.
025 *
026 * <p>
027 * This class provides a basic framework but requires implementing the following methods:
028 * <ul class='javatree'>
029 *    <li class='jm'>{@link #getDatabaseValue(String)}
030 *    <li class='jm'>{@link #exists(String)}
031 * </ul>
032 *
033 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
034 * </ul>
035 */
036@SuppressWarnings({"resource","unused","javadoc"})
037public class SqlStore extends ConfigStore {
038
039   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
040   // Static
041   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
042
043   static final String
044      SQLSTORE_jdbcUrl = "SqlStore.jdbcUrl",
045      SQLSTORE_tableName = "SqlStore.tableName",
046      SQLSTORE_nameColumn = "SqlStore.nameColumn",
047      SQLSTORE_valueColumn = "SqlStore.valueColumn",
048      SQLSTORE_pollInterval = "SqlStore.pollInterval";
049
050
051   /**
052    * Instantiates a builder for this object.
053    *
054    * @return A new builder for this object.
055    */
056   public static Builder create() {
057      return new Builder();
058   }
059
060   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
061   // Builder
062   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
063
064   /**
065    * Builder class.
066    */
067   public static class Builder extends ConfigStore.Builder {
068
069      String jdbcUrl, tableName, nameColumn, valueColumn;
070      int pollInterval;
071
072      Builder() {
073         this.jdbcUrl = env(SQLSTORE_jdbcUrl, "jdbc:derby:mydb");
074         this.tableName = env(SQLSTORE_tableName, "config");
075         this.nameColumn = env(SQLSTORE_nameColumn, "name");
076         this.valueColumn = env(SQLSTORE_valueColumn, "value");
077         this.pollInterval = env(SQLSTORE_pollInterval, 600);  // Time in seconds.
078      }
079
080      /**
081       * Sets the JDBC URL for the database connection.
082       *
083       * @param value The JDBC URL.
084       * @return This object.
085       */
086      public Builder jdbcUrl(String value) {
087         this.jdbcUrl = value;
088         return this;
089      }
090
091      /**
092       * Sets the name of the database table containing configuration entries.
093       *
094       * @param value The table name.
095       * @return This object.
096       */
097      public Builder tableName(String value) {
098         this.tableName = value;
099         return this;
100      }
101
102      /**
103       * Sets the name of the column containing configuration entry names.
104       *
105       * @param value The column name.
106       * @return This object.
107       */
108      public Builder nameColumn(String value) {
109         this.nameColumn = value;
110         return this;
111      }
112
113      /**
114       * Sets the name of the column containing configuration entry values.
115       *
116       * @param value The column name.
117       * @return This object.
118       */
119      public Builder valueColumn(String value) {
120         this.valueColumn = value;
121         return this;
122      }
123
124      /**
125       * Sets the polling interval in seconds for checking database changes.
126       *
127       * @param value The polling interval in seconds.
128       * @return This object.
129       */
130      public Builder pollInterval(int value) {
131         this.pollInterval = value;
132         return this;
133      }
134
135      @Override
136      public Builder copy() {
137         return null;
138      }
139
140      @Override
141      public SqlStore build() {
142         return build(SqlStore.class);
143      }
144   }
145
146   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
147   // Instance
148   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
149
150   private final String jdbcUrl;
151   private final String tableName, nameColumn, valueColumn;
152   private final Timer watcher;
153   private final ConcurrentHashMap<String,String> cache = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
154
155   /**
156    * Constructor.
157    *
158    * @param builder The builder for this object.
159    */
160   protected SqlStore(Builder builder) {
161      super(builder);
162      this.jdbcUrl = builder.jdbcUrl;
163      this.tableName = builder.tableName;
164      this.nameColumn = builder.nameColumn;
165      this.valueColumn = builder.valueColumn;
166
167      var pollInterval = builder.pollInterval;
168
169      var timerTask = new TimerTask() {
170         @Override
171         public void run() {
172            SqlStore.this.poll();
173         }
174      };
175
176      this.watcher = new Timer("MyTimer");
177      watcher.scheduleAtFixedRate(timerTask, 0, pollInterval * 1000);
178   }
179
180   synchronized void poll() {
181
182      // Loop through all our entries and find the latest values.
183      cache.forEach((name,cacheContents) -> {
184         var newContents = getDatabaseValue(name);
185
186         // Change detected!
187         if (! cacheContents.equals(newContents))
188            update(name, newContents);
189      });
190   }
191
192   // Reads the value from the database.
193   protected String getDatabaseValue(String name) {
194      // Implement me!
195      return null;
196   }
197
198   @Override /* ConfigStore */
199   public boolean exists(String name) {
200      // Implement me!
201      return false;
202   }
203
204   @Override /* ConfigStore */
205   public synchronized String read(String name) {
206      var contents = cache.get(name);
207      if (contents == null) {
208         contents = getDatabaseValue(name);
209         update(name, contents);
210      }
211      return contents;
212   }
213
214   @Override /* ConfigStore */
215   public synchronized String write(String name, String expectedContents, String newContents) {
216
217      // This is a no-op.
218      if (Utils.eq(expectedContents, newContents))
219         return null;
220
221      var currentContents = read(name);
222
223      if (expectedContents != null && Utils.ne(currentContents, expectedContents))
224         return currentContents;
225
226      update(name, newContents);
227
228      // Success!
229      return null;
230   }
231
232   @Override /* ConfigStore */
233   public synchronized SqlStore update(String name, String newContents) {
234      cache.put(name, newContents);
235      super.update(name, newContents);  // Trigger any listeners.
236      return this;
237   }
238
239   @Override /* Closeable */
240   public synchronized void close() {
241      if (watcher != null)
242         watcher.cancel();
243   }
244}
